title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.29 - Fire hazardous vehicles or equipment prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.29 - Fire hazardous vehicles or equipment prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall use any donkey engine or other steam engine
anywhere within a terminal area without an approved spark arrestor attached to
the smoke stack of such engine, and no person shall operate any tractor, truck
or other equipment driven by internal combustion engines within a terminal, if
the construction or condition of such equipment constitutes a fire hazard in
the opinion of the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
